entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
